tutorial-step2-desc: Tap “Flip cards” to see the cards you’ve selected
exit-alert-0: Are you sure you want to leave?
exit-alert-1:
Are you sure you want to leave?
This game will end in day(s).
Don’t miss out!
exit-alert-2:
Are you sure you want to leave?

error-body: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
result-credit: RC has been credited to your credit card (•••• )
result-alert-max: You’ve earned the maximum game plays for this mini game.
result-alert-complete: You’ve completed this mini game, well done!
result-alert-daily: You have reached the maximum number of times you can play this game today. Come back tomorrow and play again!
result-card-msg: Please refer to game T&Cs for credit card selection
thankyou-header: Thanks for playing! Try again next time.
thankyou-header-lose: The cards did not match, try again next time.
